answerText: After Many a Summer Dies the Swan[10] This British author wrote After Many a Summer Dies the Swan, in addition to a dystopian novel about Bernard Marx and John the Savage, Brave New World.
heading: VCU Closed  |2013 | Delaware + Michigan A  | 4 | Literature | British | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: In this work, the ape-like Fifth Earl of Gonister is two hundred years old. For 10 points each: [10] Identify this novel in which Jo Stoyte kills Peter after hiring Dr. Obispo to help research longevity.
